## Expr.evaluate() method

Evaluate an expression returning a \[\[Value\]\] object.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
evaluate(env: Env, scope?: ExprScope, cache?: Map<Expr, Value>): Value | never;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  env | [Env](./harp-datasource-protocol.env.md) | The \[\[Env\]\] used to lookup symbols. |
|  scope | [ExprScope](./harp-datasource-protocol.exprscope.md) | The evaluation scope. Defaults to \[\[ExprScope.Value\]\]. |
|  cache | Map&lt;[Expr](./harp-datasource-protocol.expr.md)<!-- -->, [Value](./harp-datasource-protocol.value.md)<!-- -->&gt; | A cache of previously computed results. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[Value](./harp-datasource-protocol.value.md) \| never
